segments.text: I can’t believe how careless the woman is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she’s just standing there, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so reckless, climbing on that stool to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should be paying more attention to what’s happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is just encouraging him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman even cares about the mess she’s making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting ruined, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids should know better than to climb on a stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside, it’s just a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman wakes up and realizes what’s going on before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
